114.content:
You said what if Molly grew taller
and labeled it “Big Molly”
But perhaps some choices and
elaboration would be nice


Option 1 -
What if in the shrinking machine episode
after getting shrunk then restored
Molly had later became giant?



Option 2 -
What if some time after the shrink machine incident
Molly gets curious and messes with the machine
again oblivious that the scientist had made
some untested modifications and
Molly ends up having random growth spurts
getting bigger and bigger till she’s huge but
still having spurts
114.title: Big Molly

info.brief_description: What if you make your own what if?
info.description:
The what if is your oyster do what you want.

But follow the 3 rules

1. No gays just lesbians

2. No Deaths

3. Have fun.
